send_email module¶

send_email.email(to_email, p_id, hr, time, send)¶

Send the mail to specific email address with the message of patient id, heart rate and the timestamp.

Parameters

  • to_email (string) – the receiver’s email

  • p_id (int) – the patient id

  • hr (int) – the heart rate

  • time (string) – the timestamp

  • send (bool) – the flag of sending email or not

Returns

None
